meanings.definition: In a direction opposite to the way in which the hands of a clock move.
meanings.sent1: She turned the screw anticlockwise to loosen it.
meanings.sent2: Remember to twist the lid anticlockwise to open the jar.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk anticlockwise around the bowl, thinking it would bring good luck.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts spun anticlockwise, leading him away from the usual path.
meanings.sent5: The windmill blades rotated anticlockwise, creating a mesmerizing pattern in the sky.

meanings.definition: Moving or turning in a direction opposite to the way in which the hands of a clock move.
meanings.sent1: The anticlockwise motion of the fan cooled the room effectively.
meanings.sent2: The screwdriver was designed for anticlockwise rotation.
meanings.sent3: The anticlockwise dance move confused the audience but delighted the judges.
meanings.sent4: Her mind took an anticlockwise journey through memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The anticlockwise swirl of the tornado left a path of destruction in its wake.
